ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78"
SHALL conform to Consol Smoking Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="null", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Smoking Status STATIC
SHALL conform to Consol Tobacco Use template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.85)
SHALL conform to Consol Smoking Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.78)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:14806)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:14807)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14808)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:14809)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="null", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Smoking Status STATIC
effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:16565)
effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:14818)
